resumen:
Kabel impulsa la transformación de los negocios a través de la tecnología. En un contexto de incertidumbre para las organizaciones, donde lo único constante es el cambio, las empresas necesitan adaptarse para mantener su competitividad, y para ello necesitan ser ágiles en su transformación siendo la tecnología un habilitador clave del proceso. Ante los retos a los que pensamos se enfrentan las compañías (toma de decisión, entrega de valor, colaboración, y evolución tecnológica), desde Kabel: 

• Habilitamos la toma de decisión a todos los niveles de la organización 
• Democratizamos el acceso tanto a tecnología como a información 
• Generamos el máximo valor al menor coste 
• Aceleramos el ritmo de la transformación necesaria 

Somos uno de los principales partners de Microsoft en España, con 14 competencias Gold, y especializaciones avanzadas en modernización de Aplicaciones en Azure y Kubernettes. En 2020 recibimos el premio Partner del año de Inteligencia Artificial. Formamos parte de iniciativas exclusivas a nivel mundial como el AI Inner Circle y el GitHub Inner Circle. Asimismo, somos parte del Mixed Reality Partner Program (MRPP) a nivel mundial y somos distribuidor autorizado de HoloLens 2 (DMP) lo que nos permite distribuir HoloLens con nuestras Soluciones de Realidad Mixta. Estamos también certificados en otras tecnologías cloud, como AWS y Google Cloud, y somos partners certificados de Databricks, Sitecore y Anjana Data.

Lo que diferencia a Kabel son las personas.  Un equipo multidisciplinar, de más de 250 personas, donde el 75% de la plantilla son consultores certificados en tecnologías de Microsoft, AWS, Databricks, Google Cloud y Sitecore, y están en continua formación gracias a los planes de desarrollo y capacitación.

Eurecat, Centro Tecnológico de Cataluña (miembro de Tecnio), promueve, mediante la investigación aplicada y la innovación, la competitividad de las empresas y el bienestar de la sociedad.

Es el principal centro tecnológico de Cataluña y la segunda organización privada de España en captación de fondos de H2020. Reúne la experiencia de más de 670 profesionales que generan un volumen de ingresos de 50 millones de euros anuales y da servicio a más de 1.700 empresas. 

I+D aplicada, servicios tecnológicos, formación de alta especialización, consultoría tecnológica y eventos profesionales son algunos de los servicios que Eurecat ofrece tanto para grandes como para pequeñas y medianas empresas de todos los sectores. Participa en más de 200 grandes proyectos consorciados de I+D+i nacionales e internacionales de alto valor estratégico y cuenta con 88 patentes y 7 spin-off. 

El valor añadido que aporta Eurecat acelera la innovación, disminuye el gasto en infraestructuras científicas y tecnológicas, reduce los riesgos y proporciona conocimiento especializado a medida de cada empresa.

resumen:
Innova-tsn is a company founded 18 years ago as an expert in B.I solutions, which has grown to position itself as one of the undisputed industry leaders in the design and implementation of Advanced Analytics solutions.

Dedicated to the design of intelligent business solutions in the areas of Data Value, Big Data and Advanced Analytics, Customer-Centric and Solutions Architecture, Innova-tsn provides end-to-end solutions from the provision of infrastructure or Cloud instances to project execution or provision of specialised consulting services.

Headquartered in Madrid, Innova-tsn has steadily expanded and now provides its services from Barcelona, London, Bogota and Mexico City. More than 300 professionals driven by the values of Commitment, Excellence, Business Vision and Vision for the Future make each project possible.

Innova-tsn's work has been recognised with national and international awards and excellent results have been obtained in prestigious competitions.


-----

Innova-tsn es una compañía fundada hace 18 años como experta en soluciones de B.I, que ha crecido hasta posicionarse como uno de los líderes indiscutibles del sector en el diseño e implementación de soluciones de Analítica Avanzada.

Dedicada al diseño de soluciones inteligentes de negocio en las áreas de Data Value, Big Data y Advanced Analytics, Customer Centric y Solutions Architecture, Innova-tsn provee soluciones end-to-end desde la provisión de infraestructura o instancias Cloud hasta la ejecución de proyecto o provisión de servicios de consultoría especializados.

Con su sede central en Madrid, Innova-tsn se ha expandido de manera sostenida y ahora presta sus servicios desde Barcelona, Londres, Bogotá y Ciudad de México. Más de 300 profesionales movidos por los valores de Compromiso, Excelencia, Visión de Negocio y Visión de Futuro hacen posible cada proyecto.

El trabajo Innova-tsn ha sido reconocido con premios nacionales e internacionales y en concursos de gran prestigio.

resumen:
PUE es en tecnología un referente en entornos #BigData y #Cloud.
 
Usamos nuestro conocimiento y poderes #BigData para convertir los propósitos de nuestros clientes en realidad. 

La pasión por aprender, la mejora continua, el trabajo colaborativo y el equipo como valor fundamental marcan el día a día de PUE, con el 100% del equipo certificado en las tecnologías con las que trabajan.

Nuestra misión es ayudar a transformar y modernizar las organizaciones, crear nuevas líneas de negocio e incrementar sus niveles de eficiencia, agilidad y competitividad. En definitiva, ayudarlas a mejorar para contribuir a la consecución de aquello que se propongan.

Conseguimos llevar a cabo nuestra misión a través de los servicios profesionales que ofrecemos, orientados a la optimización de los procesos a nivel empresarial así como a las decisiones basadas en el análisis y explotación de la información de negocio. Y con nuestros valores diferenciales: consultores certificados, metodologías agile, Scrum y DevOps, filosofía Customer Centric y una forma de ser innovativa y altamente comprometida.

Con las tecnologías más innovadoras y adecuadas a cada proyecto, garantizamos el cumplimiento del stack tecnológico necesario para el éxito de implantaciones Big Data en el Cloud, on premise o infraestructuras híbridas: desde la definición, arquitectura, desarrollo, monitorización, soporte y mantenimiento, hasta la formación y certificación del equipo.

Tenemos alianzas estratégicas con los líderes en Big Data y Cloud. PUE es:

- Cloudera Platinum Partner
- Service & Sell Partner para SEEMEA de Google Cloud Platform, desde 2015

Nuestra división de formación y certificación oficial nos convierte en referentes a nivel nacional desde hace más de 20 años en la capacitación de equipos y profesionales IT.

Para nosotros la mejor recompensa es ver cómo influyen los resultados de lo que hacemos en la vida de las personas, de los profesionales y de las empresas para las que trabajamos.

resumen:
Con sede central en Barcelona, ID Finance es un proveedor global de servicios de datos, análisis crediticio y finanzas digitales de rápido crecimiento, centrado globalmente en mercados emergentes.

Somos pioneros en la innovación Fintech en cuatro países de Europa y América Latina, y tenemos presencia en varias ubicaciones geográficas. La compañía ha sido reconocida como un “unicornio del mañana” por el banco de inversión londinense GP Bullhound, también ha sido nombrada por el Financial Times como la segunda Fintech de mayor crecimiento en Europa en su lista FT 1000 Europe, clasificada en el puesto 50 en Inc 5000 Europe.

Tenemos más de un millón de clientes registrados, el 90% de los nuevos clientes repite en la solicitud de un préstamo, y su ciclo de vida es 4 veces mayor que el coste de adquisición.

Hay más de 280 profesionales desarrollando negocios en nuestras operaciones en España, Polonia, Brasil y México y I+D situada en el Hi Tech Park de Bielorrusia, en Minsk.

Estamos aprovechando el crecimiento de Internet móvil y la disponibilidad de datos para proporcionar acceso a servicios financieros competitivos y transparentes y hacer frente a la enorme demanda estructural no satisfecha por los operadores tradicionales.

La ciencia de datos está mejorando la calidad, precisión y rapidez de las operaciones para ofrecer servicios financieros más competitivos y convenientes. Estamos aplicando aprendizaje automático (“machine learning”) e inteligencia artificial en todo nuestro negocio, desde la revisión de los clientes hasta la optimización de las campañas de marketing digital y la prestación de un servicio de atención al cliente eficiente.

Junto con nuestros socios, hemos construido la infraestructura de financiación digital para los servicios Fintech que ofrecemos en varios países en menos de cinco años. Ahora somos capaces de alcanzar la rentabilidad en el plazo de un año desde el lanzamiento en un nuevo territorio.

resumen:
Stayforlong es un portal de reservas hoteleras especializado en estancias largas, de tres o más noches. Somos un equipo joven con un claro objetivo: que los viajeros que reservan más noches paguen menos por su estancia.

Para nosotros está claro:
 
¿Por qué alguien que reserve una semana de hotel debería pagar lo mismo que una que esté solo dos días? Lo justo sería que si tus vacaciones son más largas pagues menos por ellas.
 
Y es que con la ayuda de nuestra web todo el mundo gana: los hoteles consiguen reservas más largas para sus habitaciones, y los viajeros mejores ofertas para pernoctar durante más tiempo.
 
Somos Stayforlong y nos encantan las vacaciones largas. 

www.stayforlong.com

Estamos convencidos de que los profesionales con talento, son el elemento clave para el éxito de las organizaciones. En Winid lo entendemos como “Talento aumentado”, al poner la tecnología y la Inteligencia Artificial al servicio de las personas.

Nuestro objetivo es alcanzar la excelencia en atraer, formar, desarrollar y equipar a los mejores Talents sourcers en Europa.  Para lograr este objetivo, hemos:

- Desarrollado un ecosistema colaborativo, en constante movimiento, de soluciones de Talent Acquisition Tech, para liderar la innovación: Reclutamiento agile, evaluaciones virtuales, gamificación, chatbot impulsado por IA, etc.

Ofrecemos experiencia y calidad, con acceso rápido para la identificación de profesionales de alto impacto, a través de un conjunto de servicios de Adquisición de Talento articulados en dos ejes:

• Executive Search: Selección de líderes, benchmarking de mercado y management audit.
• Asesoramiento en Adquisición de Talento: Zero Vacancy, RPO, programas para Jóvenes Talentos, evaluaciones virtuales y formación en Adquisición de Talento a través de nuestra Learning School (Lektio®).

Con los HQ en Barcelona, nuestro alcance es internacional, apoyados desde 7 ubicaciones y 4 hubs repartidos entre España, Francia y Colombia, con un equipo total de 150 empleados.

Winid es un nuevo player de Talent Acquisition, que ha comenzado a operar en España en 2021, propulsado por Talentpeople, líder en Francia e integrado dentro del Grupo Ergalis (300MM€ fact. y 600 profesionales).

resumen:
No one knows societal changes better than the people living them. Citibeats leverages their real-time feedback to help you make informed decisions and anticipate their needs.

Through ethical artificial intelligence that uses natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML) to process large quantities of unstructured data, Citibeats gathers actionable insights on the population's concerns related to key impact areas, such as sustainable development, financial inclusion, natural disaster response, migration, social policy, gender equality, vaccine demand, and hate speech policy. 

Our award-winning social data platform is language agnostic, all-inclusive, fast, smart, and ethical, listening to voices that traditional research approaches often ignore. 

And we're just scratching the surface. Over the next three years, we aim to influence $2 billion in budgets. By giving a voice to the people, we aim to bring humanity back into decision-making.

https://www.citibeats.com/

resumen:
State of the Art University for Technology, Entrepreneurship and Design.

Harbour.Space is an innovative private university that combines science and design taught by industry leaders from around the world. 

Harbour.Space offers distinct progressive university programmes:

- Maths as a Second Language (Foundation)
- Computer Science
- Data Science 
- Cyber Security 
- Interaction Design 
- High-tech Entrepreneurship 
- Digital Marketing
- Financial Technology (FinTech)
- Product Management 
- Front-end Development

All Harbour.Space degree awarding programmes are designed for full-time, almost year-round intensive study so that the programme can be completed in less than three years for Bachelor and two years for Master degree. Both Bachelor and Master programmes - taught in English. 

As an innovative private university we collaborate with the most relevant professionals today to be an active incubator for talented young people. Our approach sets out to pave the way to meaningful and creative careers for our technologically gifted children. 

Our teachers are the people who make technology and design move today. We believe the best way to learn is by immersion in the field of study and learning directly from the source. That’s why we invite today’s experts, the cream of the crop, to share invaluable hands-on knowledge in intensive 3 week courses.

The most innovative technology lives hand-in-hand with great design. Harbour.Space University is the first university in Europe to offer the best of both, so we can help our students become the most excellent professionals in the world.

resumen:
¿Quiénes somos?
Grupo ICA somos tecnología. Somos imaginación, diseño, aprendizaje e innovación. Somos conocimiento, especialización y colaboración. Somos más de 670 personas que contribuimos diariamente al desarrollo tecnológico de nuestros clientes desde hace 35 años, ofreciendo soluciones y servicios TIC con alto valor añadido.

¿Qué hacemos?
Transformación Digital, Ciberseguridad, Infraestructuras de Comunicaciones y Servicios Profesionales TI. Buscamos y creamos las mejores soluciones de hardware, software y servicios para adaptarlas a las necesidades específicas de las entidades públicas y privadas. 

¿Nuestra meta?
Ser el socio tecnológico de confianza de nuestros clientes, acompañándolos en su proceso de transformación digital, brindando mayor protección informática a sus organizaciones, desarrollando sus infraestructuras de telecomunicaciones y ofreciendo un equipo humano especializado en tecnologías de la información. 

¿Qué nos avala? 
Además de nuestros 35 años de buen hacer y una cartera de 200 clientes recurrentes, hemos logrado también todas las certificaciones necesarias para el desarrollo de nuestras actividades: gestión de calidad, seguridad de la información, gestión de servicios TI y gestión ambiental -ISO 9001, ISO 27001, ISO 20000 e ISO 14001, respectivamente. 

¿Dónde estamos?
La compañía tiene sede en Madrid y cuenta con delegaciones territoriales en Barcelona, Sevilla, Cádiz y Huelva.

resumen:
En Sothis creemos que la tecnología tiene que evolucionar al ritmo que marca el negocio de nuestros clientes. Por eso, ponemos a tu disposición a un equipo de 900 personas y todo su conocimiento para guiarte en tu apuesta por impulsar tu negocio. Lo hacemos con una aproximación global que cubre todas las necesidades de digitalización de cualquier compañía y con la colaboración de firmas líderes como SAP, Microsoft, Siemens, HP o IBM.
Nuestra meta es hacer evolucionar y mejorar de manera constante el negocio de las empresas que no se conforman. Que buscan soluciones que mejoren su rendimiento, operaciones y competitividad. Llevamos haciéndolo desde 2008 en todo tipo de sectores y ya confían en nosotros más de 300 clientes en 35 países.
La mente abierta, la pasión y el esfuerzo son los valores que nos guían. La mejora continúa es el espíritu que impera en todo lo que hacemos. Y nuestro modelo de gestion es la hoja de ruta que compartimos con todos nuestros stakeholders: clientes, personas, proveedores, sociedad y capital.
Con todos ellos nos marcamos un mismo objetivo común: no dejar de avanzar y crecer, aunque eso suponga salir de la zona de confort. Pero te aseguramos que el esfuerzo merecerá la pena: la digitalización es un viaje necesario y apasionante marcado por la adaptación, el aprendizaje, la optimización y la personalización.
Somos tecnología en constante movimiento. Queremos acompañarte, compartir nuestro know-how, descubrir las necesidades y virtudes de tu negocio y establecer una relación de complicidad y colaboración que te lleve más lejos de los que jamás habrías imaginado.
Sothis no para y tú tampoco.
 
¿Arrancamos?

resumen:
SEAT CODE is the Barcelona based tech company created in 2019 to disrupt the future of SEAT S.A. Our goal is to foster the digitalization within SEAT to pivot from a successful car manufacturer into an even more successful and efficient mobility service provider with fans as customers.
We will achieve such a challenge by hiring the most talented people, giving them the right work ecosystem, the right tooling, and the autonomy to develop the best-fit solutions that will delight our customers. 
We are building teams around our three product lines: Micromobility and Mobility, Customer Experience and Smart Supply Chain.

1. Micromobility and Mobility.
SEAT wants to contribute to a better, cleaner and more sustainable world by developing sharing mobility solutions that will improve people’s lives. SEAT:CODE will unleash the power of kick-scooters, electric scooters, electric cars, mobility on demand, and much more by developing its own mobility platform for SEAT and for third parties that share the same vision.

2. WOW! Customer Experience.
SEAT wants customers to flip out when thinking, getting information, purchasing or supporting any SEAT products. SEAT:CODE will work in developing solutions to improve the customer experience from the most offline experience (physical stores using VR for example) to the most online experience (e-commerce platform with subscription models for example).

3. Smart Supply Chain. 
SEAT wants to monitor, improve, and control the whole end-to-end of the supply chain of all the SEAT products. From how the pieces arrived at the factory, until when we deliver the car to our beloved customers. The goal is to be the most efficient and fastest brand delivering products to our customers. This vision encourages data ingestion, prediction, messaging oriented systems and a lot of other amazing skills.

resumen: El Grupo Asseco Internacional es una federación de empresas que reúne de forma directa e indirecta a numerosas entidades y filiales cuyas actividades están focalizadas hacia el mercado IT. Desde que comenzó su expansión internacional en el 2004, el Grupo Asseco se ha convertido en una de las diez mayores compañías de IT en Europa por capitalización bursátil, siendo además un referente en el mundo. Las soluciones propias del Grupo Asseco representan más del 50% de las ventas totales de la compañía, lo que nos coloca según el prestigioso informe “Truffle 100” como el sexto mejor proveedor de software en Europa. Estructurado por regiones, el Grupo Asseco tiene presencia en 23 países europeos y más de 40 alrededor de todo el mundo. Asseco Group no solo opera en la mayoría de los países europeos sino que también se encuentra presente en Israel, EE.UU., Canadá, Japón, Sudáfrica, Georgia y Rusia, cotizando las sociedades del Grupo en la Bolsa de Valores de Varsovia, la Bolsa de Valores de Tel Aviv, así como en el NASDAQ Global Market. Hoy Asseco Spain, tras casi 30 años en el mercado de las nuevas tecnologías, se configura como un partner líder en su segmento, ofreciendo soluciones integrales y llave en mano a sus clientes. Proporcionamos desarrollo de negocio en los ámbitos de la movilidad, diseño y comercialización de software propietario, gestión integral de despliegues, sistemas de autoservicio y kioscos de autoventa, soporte y servicio técnico, Ciberseguridad, Blockchain, Digital Workplace, Data & Analytics y soluciones IT para distintas áreas. Además, la compañía también proporciona soluciones en los sectores de Transporte, Industria, Telecomunicaciones, Banca y Seguros, Energía y Utilities, Sanidad, Educación y Administraciones Públicas. En España, Asseco ha consolidado una importante infraestructura de centros de servicio con cobertura a nivel nacional, capaz de dar respuesta a las necesidades de los proyectos y despliegues de sus clientes.

resumen:
Netrivals es una solución de Price Intelligence y Price Monitoring para ecommerces y marcas. 

Te ofrece una visión completa del mercado por medio del análisis competitivo de pricing para ayudarte a tomar decisiones de pricing más efectivas que aumenten tus ventas e ingresos.

Soluciones para comercios electrónicos:
• Monitorización de precios: monitoriza los precios a los que tus competidores venden sus productos en su página web o en distintos marketplace. Controla también la evolución de los precios de tus competidores y detecta sus patrones de fijación de precios
• Inteligencia de precios: obtén una visión de tu competitividad en el mercado por categorías de productos, por competidor, por comparador de precios, por marketplace…
• Pricing dinámico: fija precios adaptados al estado del mercado en función a las reglas que determines

Soluciones para marcas y fabricantes: 
• Análisis de mercado: analiza la evolución de los precios de tus productos en distintos comercios electrónicos y países. Conoce la distribución de marcas en los distintos sellers.
• Sistema de notificación de alertas: recibe alertas cuando se den cambios de precio en los canales de distribución.
• Monitorización de opiniones de producto: conoce qué opinan los clientes sobre tus productos en distintas plataformas y la evolución de estas opiniones

Nuestros sistemas siguen diariamente los precios de +400M de productos en +30 mil tiendas de +50 países para proporcionarte información detallada sobre distintas industrias del mercado.

MEDSIR is an international private company that was founded by scientific experts in oncology back in 2012. We are dedicated to the design and management of strategic clinical trials in oncology, from the initial study conception to the final publication of results. 

We act as the link between our international network of brilliant oncology investigators and the parties (Pharma Companies, Biotechs, Public Institutions, etc.) interested in providing the funding for their clinical research ideas. We help transform the most promising concepts from all around the world into strategic clinical trials that promote patient benefit, scientific advancement, and efficient drug development.

Today we support more than 200 ideas involving the most innovative drugs on the market and in development, optimizing every step of investigator-initiated research. Our international team of high-level clinicians and research experts are passionate about collaborating with top medical oncologists and pharmaceutical companies in order to help them develop the best treatments for patients as quickly as possible.

Want to know more about us? Feel free to visit our website: www.medsir.org

Work with us & Bring your idea to life!

#WeAreMEDSIR

At MEDSIR we have carried out the adaptation to the General Data Protection Regulation. Before following our profile, please consult our Privacy Policy available at https://medsir.org/privacy-policy/

InterSystems is the engine behind the world's most important applications in healthcare, business and government. Everything we build is designed to drive better decisions, actions, and outcomes for the people who stake their lives and livelihoods on our technology. We are guided by the IRIS principle—that software should be interoperable, reliable, intuitive, and scalable. 

Our data platform and connected care solutions have received global industry recognition including the Leader position in the Gartner Magic Quadrant and Best in KLAS awards from KLAS Research, among other honors. InterSystems is privately held – enabling us to devote all our attention to our customers.

•InterSystems Ensemble, a seamless platform for rapidly developing connectable applications
•InterSystems HealthShare, a health informatics platform and solution family for connected care
•InterSystems TrakCare, a unified healthcare information system
•Embedded technologies for analytics and mobile and Web-based applications

WHO WE ARE 

PQE Group is a women-owned Contract Quality Organisation and Complete Quality Solution provider for GCP, GLP, GMP & GDP areas in the Life Science Industry. As an international group of over 1500 employees (40% of whom are female), we are composed of 43 nationalities and have experience working in more than 25 languages. PQE Group has an excellent history of supporting companies of all sizes and exceeding compliance standards from our 28 global offices. We are dedicated to creating value for our customers by putting our multidisciplinary teams and knowledge at their service, allowing our clients to achieve and maintain compliance with the latest regulations, and contributing to creating a safer pharmaceutical environment. 

WHAT WE DO 

Since 1998, PQE Group has successfully completed more than 12,000 projects worldwide while serving our 1400+ medical device and pharmaceutical clients. We deliver turnkey quality solutions while focusing on offering exceptional cost-effectiveness and maintaining the highest quality of care for our customers. With our extensive experience, effective project management, and exceptional cost-effectiveness, PQE’s solutions are proven to be the winning combination for global corporations of all sizes. 

WHERE WE’RE GOING 

We at PQE Group strongly believe that our success is tied to the well-being of the communities and environment around us. We understand that change must come from ourselves first – so we take action through social responsibility goals like sustainable development, gender equality, protection of the environment, and health and safety. Schlesinger Group is a technology-led data company that delivers a broad range of qualitative and quantitative research solutions to connect human answers to business questions as a single point of access to your worldwide audiences.  Vast global panels, respondent sourcing expertise, feasibility, and project management experience come together for exceptional results at the speed and quality you need for marketing research success.  

Our programmatic online survey solutions get you closer to your customers faster. Our digital qualitative research technology features industry-leading platforms for online discussions, focus groups, and IDIs, mobile ethnography, and more. World-class testing, insights, and simulation spaces are strategically located in key markets across the US & Europe. Working in partnership with you, we make it smarter, faster, and easy to achieve meaningful audience engagement in-depth and at scale to drive understanding and bolder decisions. With a lifetime of experience and an uncompromising commitment to your success, we are your global research partner, anywhere, anytime.

Connect@SchlesingerGroup.com

resumen:
O nosso propósito é provocar transformações significativas desafiando o status quo constantemente. Somos uma consultoria internacional, jovem, fundada na Itália em 2003 com um ecossistema em evolução que proporciona uma transformação significativa devido à sua abordagem personalizada, atitude de criador único e espírito pioneiro em um mundo de constante mudanças. 

Somos visionários e sonhadores, olhando as coisas por diferentes pontos de vista, almejando descobrir novas metodologias e processos que solucionam a complexidade do mundo atual causando impacto positivo.
 
Com capilaridade global, possuímos cerca de 3.500 funcionários, com escritórios em 12 países e em 4 continentes, com projetos correntes em 42 países. 

No Brasil, estamos presentes com escritórios em São Paulo e no Rio de Janeiro desde 2010 suportando grandes empresas através de projetos estratégicos e de transformação e atuando principalmente nos setores de Energia, O&G, Utilities, Serviços Financeiros, Telecomunicações, Varejo, Bens de consumo, Serviços e Agronegócios. 
 
A melhor maneira de materializar a nossa forma de atuação é através do nosso payoff “HERE TO DARE”
 
A cultura da BIP está intrinsecamente expressa em nossos 4 valores de Flexibilidade, Inovação, Excelência e Integridade, com 8 comportamentos associados.
 
FLEXIBILIDADE 
1.            Avalio o ambiente com empatia
2.            Adapto a minha atuação com resiliência, quando necessário
 
INOVAÇÃO
3.            Acredito no atrito criativo para divergir e, enfim, convergir
4.            Desafio o status quo
5.            Crio soluções inovadoras que transformam a empresa e nossos clientes
 
EXCELÊNCIA
6.            Atuo de forma pragmática
7.            Busco constantemente conhecimento e evolução para superar os resultados esperados
 
INTEGRIDADE
8.            Construo relações de confiança de longo prazo com proximidade e respeito à empresa, aos clientes, aos indivíduos e, acima de tudo, a diversidade

resumen:
IOMED has developed a Natural Language Processing tool that allows hospitals to structure their information identifying clinically relevant variables from medical notes and structuring them into datasets, which can then be easily queried. Thanks to this data structuration, professionals and researchers from the hospitals can access to the information stored in their facilities more quickly thus accelerating patient recruitment by reducing the time invested in this process. At the same time, it allows hospitals to improve the quality of their services.

Overall, we accelerate Clinical Research through the use of Artificial Intelligence, allowing access to structured RWD from hospital medical records and considerably optimizing your studies in time and access to patient volume.

Finally, data protection is IOMED’s priority and we work to ensure a safe and secure environment: each hospital decides and authorizes all data uses and participation in projects, the data is stored entirely within the hospital, 
and always following international and Spanish legislation.

resumen:
CaixaBank Business Intelligence nace el 17 de Noviembre de 2016 como una sociedad filial 100% CaixaBank para convertirse en una empresa referente en el mercado de las nuevas tecnologías de Inteligencia de Negocio.  

Con un equipo multidisciplinar de más de 90 profesionales altamente cualificados (Ingenieros, Físicos, Matemáticos, Economistas, etc.), lideramos las iniciativas del Grupo CaixaBank en el ámbito de la Analítica Comercial Avanzada, con la misión de mejorar la experiencia de nuestros clientes a través de la gestión de la información, consiguiendo una visión 360º que nos permita optimizar los contactos comerciales y dar apoyo científico a la estrategia comercial de la entidad. 

Para ello, utilizamos técnicas de vanguardia en los campos de la Ciencia de Datos y la Inteligencia Artificial (Ensemble Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Network Analytics, etc.). Asimismo, disponemos de las últimas tecnologías en el mercado en Analítica Avanzada, incluyendo Python, R, ODM, SAS, etc., y de un moderno entorno de Customer Experience Managemente Omnicanal que nos permite la activación del dato en Real Time y la generación de valor de forma inmediata.

Nuestro equipo se enfrenta al reto de explotar un Data Lake de vanguardia en el ámbito del Big Data, que procesa más de 50 mil millones de transacciones al año y almacena más de un PetaByte de información, con un stream diario de más de 7 TeraBytes de información.   

Trabajamos en un entorno vivo y dinámico ubicado en Barcelona y Madrid, y apostamos por la creatividad, la agilidad y la innovación en el que las personas puedan desarrollarse y participar en proyectos de gran alcance que impactan directamente en el día a día de nuestros millones de clientes. 

¿Quieres unirte a nosotros?

resumen:
Localizamos, actualizamos e implantamos el contenido digital multilingüe de las marcas más importantes del mundo.

Datawords ha desarrollado un saber hacer y una maestría únicos en la adaptación de las estrategias digitales de sus clientes para dotarlas de una eficacia absoluta en cada mercado local, acelerando así la expansión internacional de cada uno de ellos.

Para una marca, el éxito del despliegue internacional de su estrategia digital y sus distintos tipos de contenido no depende de su apariencia internacional, sino de su destreza para sacar a relucir su identidad local y llegar a convertirse en una marca japonesa en Tokio, china en Cantón e italiana en Milán. 

Datawords proporciona soluciones a medida para sus clientes y trabaja estrechamente con ellos para adaptarlas constantemente a nuevos formatos. La adopción de la tecnología no sigue el mismo ritmo en todos los países, lo que revela un entorno digital global heterogéneo. Gracias a este enfoque, Datawords ha desarrollado el Datawords Multilingual Digital Suite, que permite seguir la complejidad de los proyectos digitales internacionales en una amplia variedad de tecnologías, incluyendo los sistemas de gestión de contenidos o los servidores de anuncios.

Las colaboraciones tecnológicas acordadas con los proveedores de soluciones más importantes, como Adobe, Sales Force Commerce Cloud o Sizmek, permiten a Datawords integrar perfectamente el Multilingual Digital Suite en su entorno digital actual.

Datawords también ha reforzado su oferta de producción de vídeos multilingües con la integración de Digiprod en septiembre de 2014, un medio de comunicación en auge en el mundo digital.

Datawords cuenta con la certificación ISO 9001 y ha recibido varios premios. El más reciente es el Digital International Award, otorgado por el IE-Club, en colaboración con Microsoft, Ubifrance y el Instituto Nacional Francés de Propiedad Industrial.

resumen:
CLS is a global company and pioneer provider of monitoring and surveillance solutions for the Earth, created in 1986. We are subsidiary of the French Space Agency (CNES) and CNP, an investment firm. Our mission is to create innovative space-based solutions to understand and protect our planet and to manage its resources sustainably. CLS employs 900 people at our headquarters in Toulouse (France) and in 34 other sites around the world.

The company works in five strategic markets: sustainable fisheries management, environmental monitoring, maritime surveillance, mobility, and energy & infrastructures monitoring.

CLS processes data from 100,000 transponders per month (such as drifting buoys, animal tags, VMS transponders, & LRIT tracking) and observes the oceans and inland waters (more than 20 instruments onboard satellites daily deliver information to CLS on the world's seas and oceans). In addition, we monitor land and sea activities by satellite (nearly 10,000 radar images and several hundred drone flights are processed each year).

Committed to a sustainable planet, the company works every day for the Earth, from Space.

resumen:
Uni Systems, a member of Quest Group, has been a reliable ICT partner to companies and organizations in the European market for over 58 years. We are the first IT company founded in Greece, in 1964, and we have been supporting our clients ever since. Trusting customers, extensive solutions offering, strong partnerships and experienced people, those are the main grounds for Uni Systems’ rapid expansion of operations across geographies and industries.

With more than 1100 specialized ICT professionals, established presence in more than 26 countries, and branches and subsidiaries in the heart of the European Union (Athens, Barcelona, Brussels, Bucharest, Luxembourg and Milan), we are effectively addressing the needs of European and International organizations and institutions and delivering value-added integrated solutions to our customers. 
Through our strong industrial vertical expertise, supported by the range of our horizontal solutions, we hold a substantial and successful track record in the delivery and implementation of large-scale, mission-critical projects in the sectors of Banking & Finance, Enterprise & Utilities, Government, and Telecommunications, as well as in EU Institutions and Agencies. 
Participations in real commercial implementations of best practices (i.e. ITIL, RUP, PRINCE2, PMI), has provided our people with significant experience, unique know-how and proven capability in designing, implementing and successfully supporting complex ICT projects, through a range of solutions and business areas.
At Uni Systems, we support innovation, and we have been investing in the European and National research ecosystem. Our Research and Innovation (RDI) department has been successfully bidding and winning a series of research programs in promising technological areas, such as 5G, AI in Health, and Blockchain in Governance.

Enabling our clients' digital transformation journey is our passion and we remain strongly committed to it.

Recognized as one of the top mobile game makers in the world by PocketGamer.biz in 2021, Tilting Point was founded in 2012, and has grown to a staff of over 200 people in offices in Boston, Barcelona, Kyiv, Los Angeles, New York, Seoul, and San Diego. resumen:
OUR DRIVING PURPOSE - DESIGN TO VALUE
The process of delivering built assets has become fragmented. As a result, value is diluted at every stage.

A UNIFYING APPROACH
The most efficient route to the most efficient solution is first to make sure you analyse and understand a project from every angle. Maximising the value of an asset is finding the right balance of a wide range of criteria.

Design to Value is well understood and applied in the manufacturing industries. It leads to objective analysis of every aspect of a process, every element of resource requirement, energy consumption, knowledge, and cost. It leads to testing of the value parameters each of these elements is being measured against. It is rigorous, logical and data-driven. Its application in construction is transformational.

ITERATE IN DIGITAL
Our approach is to dismantle a process rigorously until we reduce it to its smallest components. Then we call on a breadth and depth of expertise to optimise every component, so that when we combine them in the complete solution, the whole will operate to the maximum efficiency of all of its parts.
From the earliest stages, we work with 3-D visualisations of processes and physical assets. This allows us to iterate and test multiple variables.

AUTOMATION IN CONSTRUCTION
There are many elements of built assets that are, or could be, automated or standardised across multiple processes in one or more sectors and industries. The benefits of standardisation are visible every day in the manufacturing industry, at global scale. We bring them to construction, in our Platforms approach to Design for Manufacture and Assembly (P-DfMA).

A PROVEN APPROACH
We do not come to any project with a ready-made solution. We bring only our Design to Value approach, using the combined powers of data, technology and imagination to establish what the most effective solution will be.

Design to Value is proven to deliver better results for our clients - and for the built environment.
especialidad: Architecture + Integrated Design, Structural + Civil Engineering, Design for Asset Optimisation, Chip Thinking, DfMA, Systemisation + Platforms, BIM, Mechanical + Electrical Engineering, Process Facility Design, Creative Technologies, software design, PDfMA, Generative design, Computational design, Sustainability, Green architecture, Passivhaus, Data center design, Healthcare design, Data center architect y Hospital design

resumen:
Mediktor is the most accurate AI-based medical assistant for triage and pre-diagnosis. The technology combines artificial intelligence and natural language recognition with patient data to explore symptoms and offer a listing of possible conditions and recommendations.  And, using our clients’ provider networks, the user can connect to a clinician immediately for care and consultation.

The Mediktor platform learns from every interaction, developing an advanced intuition. Mediktor has already performed 3 million symptom evaluations in 181 countries.  This has led to the development of an intuition comparable to the full life experience of 10 physicians. The platform has undergone a clinical study with 1,015 patients achieving a success rate of 91.3% accuracy. Four other trials are underway across the world.  The “white-label” technology is available in 10 languages and for any platform.

Founded in 2011 by Oscar García-Esquirol, MD, a specialist in intensive care medicine and Cristian Pascual, industrial engineer, Mediktor is based in Barcelona and has recently opened an office in New York. Mediktor has a multidisciplinary team of health professionals, computer scientists, business development experts and external advisors.

resumen:
AllRead Machine Learning Technologies is a Computer Vision Deep Tech Startup developing a cutting-edge Character Recognition Technology, based on a Deep Learning neural network model. Our Lead partners are the Mobile World Capital Barcelona and the Computer Vision Center of Barcelona

AllRead MLT tracks down, extracts and converts into Big Data the relevant alphanumeric text from operational environments, using Visual Computing software.

Text represents data and appears omnipresent in the value chain of companies with industrial processes (serial numbers, ID codes, meter readings...). AllRead MLT creates value through an innovative and frictionless (mobile) solution to gather data, providing automatic and accurate extraction of the targeted content in operations. It improves efficiency reducing repetitive manual tasks and allowing immediate digitization and processing of the information.

resumen:
No solo recolectamos datos, también los conectamos. YouGov es un grupo internacional de análisis y estudio de mercado. Nuestra cadena de valor es un círculo perfeccionado formado por un panel online muy comprometido y métodos directo que nos ofrecen, de forma continua, una gran cantidad de información.  
Nuestra oferta de datos proviene de un panel altamente participativo de más de 11 millones de personas en todo el mundo, lo que nos proporcionan flujos de datos continuos y en directo. Capturamos y descargamos estos datos a través de nuestra variedad de plataformas de recogida de datos y los unificamos en YouGov Cube, una exclusiva biblioteca de datos única en el mundo.   
Potenciamos el valor de todos los datos conectados gracias a nuestra tecnología de vanguardia y una sólida experiencia en investigación de mercado, lo que nos hace capaces de ofrecer a nuestros clientes una plataforma de investigación innovadora para crear, mejorar y redefinir cualquier tipo de campaña o acción de marketing. Fundada en Reino Unido en el año 2000, YouGov es considerada la empresa pionera en el análisis de datos y estudios de mercado online.  
Nuestro exclusivo modelo online totalmente integrado dispone de un historial bien documentado y publicado, que refleja la precisión de nuestros métodos de encuesta y, a su vez, justifica la calidad del trabajo de servicio al cliente. 
Desarrollamos análisis y estudios en todo el mundo, lo que nos permite ofrecer a los clientes resultados internacionales de forma más rápida y rentable que los métodos tradicionales, sin influir en la calidad de los resultados.  
YouGov dispone de oficinas en Reino Unido, USA, Europa, MENA y APAC. Nuestro objetivo principal es entender a tu organización, el mundo que la rodea y el sector en el que trabaja: lo que nos permite ofrecerle un volumen continuo de datos precisos junto a una visión global de lo que la gente piensa y hace en todo el mundo

resumen:
WHO WE ARE
We create video technology software that helps people understand what they are looking at - in security and beyond.

We find information in video data that people can act on:
– Either to revisit things that happened in the past
– Or to see things in real-time
– and soon we will be able to see things before they actually happen.
In other words, we make the world see.

MILESTONE AS AN EMPLOYER
When joining Milestone, you will be part of the world’s leading provider of IP Video Management Systems. Since our start in Denmark in 1998, we have grown to over 1.000 employees across development centers and regional offices in more than 25 countries. Today, our solutions are used in 500,000+ installations worldwide – with many more to come.

We believe, that our success first and foremost is based on our sworn dedication to put people first – the people we work with and the people around us. It's how we grow our culture, our business, and our community. We want to blaze new trails, stay curious and push the industry standard. Investing in people is how we do it. Because at Milestone, we grow together. Are you ready to grow your career, then visit milestone.com/careers

PRIVACY POLICY
Milestone has always been a strong proponent of safety and security – especially when it comes to that of the individual. We take privacy concerns very seriously and do our utmost to be transparent about how we store and use data. As a consequence, we salute the GDPR initiative and its ambition to safeguard personal privacy. For further information on how we handle and use data, please see our privacy policy at: https://www.milestonesys.com/privacy-policy.

Conceived in Italy, crafted in the Netherlands. GARCIA is the fashion brand with a denim heart.

We are part of the JOG Group, our mother company under which Jeans Centre (Jeans Specialist retailer with 100 stores & online), GARCIA Outlets (38 Outlet Stores across Europe), and GARCIA operate.

The company is family owned, was founded in 1977 and has over 1000 employees across Europe. 

GARCIA’s Head Office is based in Ablasserdam, a small city under the wings of Rotterdam, the Netherlands. 

In 2018 GARCIA is sold in 35 countries, with an estimated turnover of 110 million euro and with the DACH* Area as our biggest market.

resumen:
Pionnier du recrutement digital, Altaïde est reconnu comme « LE » chasseur de têtes des start-up et des entreprises en transformation digitale. Présents à Paris, Bordeaux et Barcelone, nous accompagnons nos clients en Recrutement, Executive Search, RPO et Conseil tant en France qu’à l’international.
Notre objectif : créer la meilleure équipe possible (top management, marketing, sales, technique) pour développer votre activité.

Fortement impliqués dans l’écosystème, nous apportons à nos clients et candidats une expérience unique du conseil en recrutement / chasse de têtes pour les entreprises en cours de transformation digitale et les start-up des métiers de l’Édition Logiciel, E-commerce, Internet / Web, Gaming, Coud, Big Data, IOT Internet of Things, Cleantech, Fintech, Healtech, Medtech, Blockchain, Intelligence Artificielle IA, Informatique Quantique…

Grâce à notre approche innovante du sourcing (LinkedIn Recruiter, Twitter, Marketing Automation, Programmatic, IA Search…), notre soin apporté à la relation candidats, et nos expertises métiers, nos clients reconnaissent notre efficacité et notre professionnalisme.

Nos missions se répartissent entre executive search (1/3) et recrutement de profils marketing digital / ventes (1/3) et techniques (1/3). 

Nous recrutons en permanence tous types de profils :
• Top Management : PDG, CEO, Directeur Général, COO, Directeur des Opérations, Directeur Marketing, Chief Digital Officer, Directeur E-Commerce, CFO, DPO, Direction des Opérations, VP Sales, Directeur Commercial...
• Marketing et Webmarketing : product marketing, chef de produit, responsable e-commerce, chef de projet digital, responsable acquisition, traffic manager, fidélisation, SEO manager, SEA, CRM, marketing digital, marketing automation, analytics, social media, e-merchandiser, Big Data...
• Commercial : ingénieur commercial, grands comptes, key account, customer success manager, account manager, directeur de clientèle, inside sales

resumen:
WHO WE ARE

Do you love learning? Does the idea of working for an EdTech company that was born in Silicon Valley and has offices in Barcelona and San Francisco excite you? Then Edpuzzle might just be your perfect fit.


Used in over 50% of schools in the USA, Edpuzzle makes it easy for teachers to engage their students with interactive video lessons.


We’re a small team of talented creatives (many of us former teachers) who got our start back in 2013 at ImagineK12, the first education incubator in the USA and now part of Y Combinator, where Airbnb and Dropbox were born. We have fantastic support from our teachers and investors, who allow us to continue growing our Edpuzzle community every day.


WHAT WE DO

We empower teachers to make any video their lesson with our easy-to-use video editing tools and beautiful, hassle-free analytics showing students’ results. In just a few clicks, teachers can turn any video into an engaging and effective lesson, and then see in real time which students understood the lesson and who needs help, thanks to the insightful student data Edpuzzle gathers.

WHY WE DO IT

We dream of a day where every teacher and student will be just a click away from an excellent online education, and we’re working to turn it into a reality. Together with the teachers in our Edpuzzle community, we’re creating a pool of incredible quality, inspiring video lessons for the classroom.
especialidad: video-editing, formative assessment, tracking, flipped classroom, education y edtech

Retail Rocket is an all-in-1 Retention Management Platform.
We help solve three main tasks: make high-end marketing technologies easier to use for marketers, improve marketing efficiency for the business and make marketing actually useful for your customers. — empower your business with CDP and store all the data you need to build marketing campaigns in Data Warehouse module
— segment your customer database using smart mathematical models available in our Customer Intelligence module
— develop efficient marketing communications for key customer segments across email, web / mobile push, SMS and other channels with Campaign Management System
— personalise every step of the customer journey via our AI Personalization Engine


Retail Rocket is a global company with a team of more than 20 different nationalities active in Europe since 2016. Since our foundation in 2012, we have successfully completed over 1000 projects all around the world. The European HQ is located in The Hague (Netherlands) and we have offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Berlin (Germany). Our data warehouse is securely located in Germany. Retail Rocket has also offices in Latin America and Asia. The company is owned by a European investment group.

resumen:
Infomineo is the global leader in the business of "brainshoring".

Infomineo allows its clients to focus on their core activities by outsourcing support activities which require judgment and critical thinking (hence brain-shoring) to locations where they would not operate otherwise (currently Casablanca and Cairo, and Mexico city soon). To guarantee the best return on investment to our clients we operate on a retainer basis.

We help our clients access insights which are critical for decision making (our research service), access expertise (our expert network), translate business concepts (our translation service) and represent data in a beautiful and creative way (our design services).

Infomineo serves all the leading global consulting firms, and now more than 50 of the Fortune 500 companies.

Infomineo is ISO 27001 certified (Information Security)

Learn more about Infomineo and its service offerings, visit us at www.infomineo.com.

resumen:
Fundada en 2010 en Uruguay por Lorena Prego, Prometeo Talent está transformando la manera de encontrar talento tecnológico en el mundo.
Impulsados por la tecnología y procesos ágiles, buscamos la mejor manera de generar relaciones humanas entre el talento y empresas IT. Nos aseguramos de que disfruten de un proceso efectivo, estable y ágil.
Nuestra misión es ayudar a Startups y Hi-techs construir un equipo de trabajo sólido y confiable. 
Creemos en un reclutamiento basado en el acercamiento humano, cualidad indispensable para poder alcanzar los objetivos deseados. Somos especialistas en reclutamiento ofreciendo soluciones en Recursos Humanos ágiles y diseñadas para la industria IT. 

Algunos de los principales roles y tecnologías que manejamos son:
- Liderazgo: CTOs, Arquitectos, Tech Leads, Project & Product Managers
- Desarrolladores: Frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, etc.), Backend (PHP, Java, .NET, Phyton, MySql, etc.), Fullstack, Móvil (Kotlin, Swift, etc.)
- Ingeniero de datos
- Other: DevOps/SRE, UX/UI, Cloud, QA

Síguenos!

resumen:
Aquila Capital is an investment and asset development company focused on generating and managing essential assets on behalf of its clients. By investing in clean energy and sustainable infrastructure, Aquila Capital contributes to the global energy transition and strengthens the world’s infrastructure backbone. The company initiates, develops, and manages essential assets along the entire value chain and lifetime. Currently, Aquila Capital manages EUR 13.2 billion on behalf of institutional investors worldwide. Our primary objective is to generate performance for our clients by managing the complexity of essential assets.
Established in 2001, Aquila Capital is founder- and partner-owned. The shareholders are backed by a minority stake of Daiwa, one of the largest Asian investors. Over the last two decades, Aquila Capital and its subsidiaries explored, projected, and engaged in meaningful trends for mankind and our planet. 
Today, the company manages wind, solar and hydropower energy assets of 11.1 GW capacity. Additionally, 1.7 million square metres of sustainable real estate and green logistics projects have been completed or are under development. Aquila Capital also invests in energy efficiency, timber, and data centres. Aquila Capital has been carbon neutral since 2006. Sustainability has always been part of our value system and is an integral part of our investment strategies, processes, and management of our assets. The company has around 630 employees from 48 nations, operating in 16 offices in 15 countries worldwide.

Open Evidence is a research and consulting firm delivering theory-based and empirically robust practical insights for informed decision-making in a wide variety of areas. Open Evidence works in the domain of applied research and consulting, based on analytical approaches that include Social and Behavioural Sciences and Data Science.

Open Evidence provides high quality evidence and practical support to the public sector at EU, national and regional level. Our track record includes a long-term history of projects conducted for a several institutions, including the European Commission, the European Parliament and different European agencies and national governments. In addition, Open Evidence is working for multiple private clients from different sectors.

Born as a spin-off of Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (UOC), Open Evidence is now a fully independent organization owned by its partners. Our team is formed by professors, researchers and data scientists with more than 20 years of experience in applied research and consultancy, working from our two offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Milan (Italy).

resumen:
Matrix42 Workspace Management makes corporate IT simple, cost-effective and secure. For IT staff and for users. Today's location-independent workers want future-ready, self-service digital workspaces. Therefore, they need authenticated access to workspaces across the world. May they be physical, virtual or mobile.
Matrix42 delivers to these needs by deploying and managing workspaces through a holistic, integrated, and automated solution. More than 5,000 customers worldwide thus benefit from a noticeably less burdened IT, cost savings and significantly more productive users.

Benefits for decision-makers:
Decision makers have a full overview about costs and can run their business on an investment-safe basis. A modern and safe working environment attracts skilled employees and keeps staff satisfied.
Find out more on www.matrix42.com 

Benefits for IT managers and IT staff: 
IT managers can run a highly efficient and profitable IT through optimization of IT expenditure for hardware and software. IT profits from automated deployment of software, services, and licenses, including compliance and security functionalities. Not least, all in IT gain more time for important projects.
Want a free trial? Get it on www.matrix42.com/en/test-matrix42/

Benefits for users: 
With 1-2 clicks via a self-service portal, employees get the exact services and applications they need. They can access their individual working environment securely from anywhere. Cyber-attacks are warded off in real-time, and work can go on without delays.

resumen:
SISCOG is focused on the optimisation of resources, namely time and space, vehicles, staff and natural resources.

And that focus has guided us for more than 30 years in creating decision-support solutions for the planning and management of resources in the most efficient and sustainable way, guaranteeing our clients better decisions, better operations, higher production, and better quality of their offer.

Using a combination of Artificial Intelligence and Operations Research techniques, the SISCOG Suite is composed of ONTIME, for creating and updating timetables, FLEET, for scheduling and management of vehicles and CREWS, for scheduling and management of staff.

Amongst our clients are renowned companies, such as the VIA Rail Canada, DSB the Danish Railways, NS the Netherlands Railways, VR the Finnish Railways, VY the Norwegian Railways, FGC the Suburban Trains of Catalonia, MEDWAY the Portuguese Freight Railways, the Lisbon Metro and London Underground.

OPTIMISING THE RESOURCES OF THE WORLD

resumen:
Grupo Clarcat es el producto de la voluntad de un grupo de profesionales con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector de las tecnologías de la información, convencidos de que el éxito radica en ofrecer un excelente servicio.

Proporcionamos a nuestros clientes soluciones y sistemas de información innovadores y eficientes utilizando tecnologías emergentes de última generación que garantizan el éxito en su evolución.

Desde nuestra creación Clarcat se ha regido por sus valores corporativos que conforman nuestra cultura de empresa y guían nuestro comportamiento y nuestras decisiones: Sentido Común, Solidez, Flexibilidad, Proximidad, Integridad, Saber-Hacer y Eficiencia.

As a specialist in smart sensor technology and decentralized automation, Turck brings intelligence to machines and ensures reliable detection, transmission and processing of relevant production data – from sensor to cloud – not only with robust I/O solutions in IP67, but also with user-friendly software and services.

Automation solutions from Turck increase the availability and efficiency of machines and plants in numerous industries and applications, from the food, pharmaceutical or chemical industry to the automotive industry and mobile machinery to intralogistics and packaging. More than 4,650 employees worldwide develop, produce and sell products and solutions from the areas of sensor, fieldbus, control, cloud, connection and interface technology as well as HMI and RFID. Our worldwide production and sales network includes more than 30 subsidiaries as well as agencies in another 60 countries.

resumen:
Somos una empresa joven que busca impulsar el desarrollo tecnológico en pequeños y medianos negocios. Nuestro principal objetivo es hacer crecer este tipo de empresas. 

StockAgile es la herramienta específica de retail para marcas, mayoristas y minoristas para automatizar y optimizar todas sus operaciones en una sola plataforma.

Esta herramienta permite analizar el ciclo de vida del producto, desde que es diseñado o comprado, hasta que es vendido al cliente final, ofreciendo una experiencia de compra omnicanal. Además, elimina la complejidad de elegir qué producto diseñar o comprar, elegir la tienda adecuada para incrementar sus ventas, o encontrar un equilibrio entre existencias y promociones.

StockAgile utiliza minería de datos y algoritmos de inteligencia artificial para crear modelos predictivos que aumenten las ventas, a través de la asignación asistida de inventario, aprovisionamiento automático y a la optimización de roturas de stock.

Entre múltiples funcionalidades, el producto ofrece la gestión de la fabricación, la gestión del inventario y almacenes, la gestión de la venta al por mayor, la gestión del punto de venta para tiendas y la sincronización con ecommerce.

Founded in 2011, Roamler provides businesses with B2B crowd-based solutions, answering the call of companies for efficiency with widespread, on-demand professionals and individuals. These 'Roamlers' are recruited, trained, and organized according to their skills, experience, and location, and then matched to 'tasks'.

Roamler is the European leader in crowd-supported field-marketing activities, performing tasks for the biggest FMCG manufacturers, consumer brands, PCGs, and retail chains.

Since 2016, Roamler is also active in crowd-supported technical solutions such as installations, service and repairs, executed by a network of certified professionals spread across the Netherlands, the UK and Germany.

In 2018, Roamler launched the first-ever venture to increase flexibility and efficiency in the home care and healthcare industries, by leveraging the power of a large network of professional caregivers active across the Netherlands.

In 2020, Roamler received a 20M euros funding from Endeit Capital, Smartfin and Achmea Innovation Fund and ranked among the top three fastest-growing scale-ups in Europe.

In March 2021, Roamler acquired Datlinq, data company specialized in foodservice and food retail data, with the purpose of enabling its clients to build a fully data-driven route- to- market also in the out-of-home channel.

In October 2021, through its Retail division, Roamler has acquired Mobeye, strong French player in crowd-supported field marketing services for businesses; with the goal of further expanding its commercial proposition to FMCGs and retailers, while consolidating a leadership position also in the French market.

Sign up to our monthly newsletter to receive the latest insights, innovations,
and opportunities when it comes to flexible resourcing for businesses! https://campaign.roamler.com/newsletter

resumen:
I-care is a global leader in predictive and prescriptive maintenance. Our AI-powered and data driven solutions predict industrial failures before anyone else. With our innovative methods, products and services, we take care of thousands of assets and processes of clients around the world and we help them reduce risks for safer, more productive, and more sustainable industries. Founded in 2004 and based in Belgium, I-care employs over 500 people and has offices in 26 countries (Europe, USA, and Asia). It was named Business of the Year 2020.

I-care is a responsible partner. We are responsible towards all of our stakeholders and our planet.

Our values are respect for others, performance, and sustainability.

- Respect for others. We deeply care about our people. We strongly believe in and promote equality, diversity, and inclusion. We support each employee and we empower one another. We trust each other and achieve more by working together. We are loyal and honest, and we also know how to have fun.

- Performance. We deeply care about our customers. Exceeding their expectations is our top priority. We help them to be models of efficiency and innovation. Overall, companies that work with us reduce their industrial breakdowns by as much as 95% and increase their site productivity by as much as 30%. We nurture long-term relationships with our clients and have not lost a single one of them since our founding in 2004.
 
- Sustainability. We deeply care about our planet and want to contribute to a more sustainable world. Thanks to I-care solutions and services, industrial assets around the world consume less and pollute less. By improving the operation conditions of our clients’ assets, we also prevent human and environmental disasters. Our development strategy is based on sustainable growth and innovation. We constantly invest in R&D to further improve our technology and have an even greater impact.

EXPERTISE

There are five pillars to our activities and interventions:
- Agile Governance & Project Management,
- Business & Operations,
- Processes & Change Management,
- Digital Transformation & Data Management,
- Finance, Risk & Compliance.

Taleo advises its customers with the best talents on the market. We select only highly-skilled professionals who become agile members of their organization and help our clients deliver more than the initial expectations.

VALUES

Our three values, Family, Fun and Excellence are at the core of our day-to-day activities and shape the way we interact with both our collaborators and our partners. We strive for excellence and we meet the target!

CSR

As a United Nations Global Compact company, we have committed to putting Human Rights, Labour, Environment and Anticorruption at the core of our strategies and operations. Taleo has been appointed Great Place to Work and is certified Ecovadis since 2020. We are involved with several NGOs that support women's rights, refugees, children, and sustainability.

JOBS

We are always on the lookout for talented people to enrich our culture and growing family. If you are a candidate, feel free to apply via our website!

resumen:
Proficio is a world-class Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) providing managed detection and response solutions, 24×7 security monitoring and advanced data breach prevention services to organizations globally. 

Our rapid growth is being fueled by the rise in cloud-based services, the acceptance of the Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, and the increasing number of cyber security attacks on businesses, hospitals and government. We have developed proprietary security content and threat intelligence tools to identify and proactively defend against advanced attacks and insider threats. Proficio’s founders are veterans of the security and networking industry who have helped guide multiple companies to successful exits.
 
Proficio’s customers benefit from the most advanced security monitoring and 24×7 managed security services that until recently were outside the budget of all but the very largest enterprises. Proficio’s ProSOC service offerings include the following:
 • 24×7 security event monitoring, alerting, and remediation
 • Advanced SIEM correlation analysis
 • Protection against complex attacks and insider threats
 • Actionable intelligence that enables internal IT teams to effectively and quickly resolve issues
 • Threat Intelligence 
 • Active Defense that blocks targeted attacks in real time 24×7
 • Worry-free compliance audits for: PCI, HIPAA, SOX, GLBA, FFIEC, NERC CIP, and FISMA regulations
 • Visibility to event logs with easy-to-use web portal, powerful reporting, dashboards, and drill-down analytics
 • Full management of security devices including patching, health and performance monitoring, and tuning
 • Free 12 month log retention
 • Out-of-the-box support for 400+ log sources
• Scalable cloud-based deployment – fast implementation and no software or hardware purchases
• Advanced scanning eliminating vulnerabilities before they can be exploited

resumen:
Founded in 2015 within the Innovative Enterprises business incubator of the Politecnico di Torino, Enerbrain has developed energy retrofit solutions for large buildings that allow drastic cuts in consumption as well as a significant improvement in internal comfort. Thanks to innovative IoT hardware and powerful algorithms in the cloud to fine-tune energy usage in real time Enerbrain allows operational savings. The main focus goes beyond energy by providing the best indoor air quality and educating occupants in order to generate a wider social impact thanks to engagement tools and a new way to access data across devices.

Compatible with all HVAC systems, Enerbrain system provides the application of plug & play sensors in the building and a device to act to regulate in real time ventilation, heating and cooling based on the reference parameters: outdoor and indoor temperature, relative humidity, CO2 and occupants in the building connected with powerful algorithms.
A smart innovation, which quickly affects the energy management of a building without changes to the existing systems or without drastic structural changes. In most cases it takes two days of installation to cut energy consumption by 30% forever, improving the indoor air quality and the thermal comfort.
The system integrates a unified management through an analytical dashboard, also accessible through an app.
A win-win model for energy efficiency that is rewarded trough the savings in bills and takes on a strategic value for the enhancement of real estate assets.

resumen:
Saphetor SA, is a global precision-medicine company dedicated to large-scale identification and interpretation of human genetic variants by leveraging proprietary algorithms and expert domain knowledge.

Saphetor is the creator of VarSome, a suite of intuitive and data-driven bioinformatics solutions for clinicians and researchers. VarSome is powered by a Molecular DB with over 130 integrated and harmonized genomic data sources, linked by AI to over 32 million publications. Thanks to VarSome’s global community of over 450 000, the database is further enriched by additional unique user-generated annotation. Saphetor has developed proprietary algorithms to automate variant classification based on industry-standard ACMG and AMP guidelines for interpretation of germline and somatic variants, as well as CNVs. 

The VarSome suite offers solutions for individuals needing a powerful Search tool to support research, professional labs requiring a CE-IVD and HIPPA-compliant platform to Analyze NGS samples, and bioinformaticians wanting to use our simple API to access our database and classifiers and integrate into existing Code.

resumen:
Flanks is a Wealth Tech B2B service platform which digitally optimizes your operational efficiency by automating and scaling connections with custodian entities. Created by co-founders Joaquim de la Cruz, Sergi Lao and Álvaro Morales, the firm has come a long way since its beginnings in 2018. 

Using Flanks as a wealth data orchestrator allows financial advisors to connect to any global entity in an automatic way. And therefore, help them aggregate their client’s wealth. By using Flanks’ solution, they get a global position of their client’s operations across all entities, making financial information sharing secure, easy and quick.

In the interconnected world we live in, it is common for clients to have investments, savings and other financial products in different custodian entities. To break this data obstacle, the market offers different solutions to aggregate investment data. Flanks’ scraping technology however, allows to connect to any new custodian entity without having to interact to leverage the consent and credentials. The methodology Flanks uses, known as  “Reverse engineering”, plugs you directly into the core banking of custodian entities. That doesn’t only make the connection more robust, more secure and richer in data (in terms of position and operation of investment products), but is also faster. All of the without suffering possible changes of user interfaces.
especialidad: Fintech, BaaS, Data Aggregation, Open Banking, Financial Services, API Banking, Big Data, Data Analytics y Reporting

resumen:
Born in 2014 after seeing a massive opportunity for technology to disrupt the multi-trillion SME financing market, AREX is a competitive data-driven fintech company aiming to bridge capital market liquidity and SME cashflow needs.

Our first product is an automated receivables exchange platform where SME invoices are converted into a tradable asset class called Exchange Traded Receivables (ETRs). ETRs are then sold on an open market where a single ETR can be purchased by one or multiple investors using automated trading bots. Most of the ETRs are filled within seconds of being listed.

Unlike our competitors, AREX works exclusively with accounting partners to provide accurate financial pictures of both borrowing firms and their debtors, hence creating a more comprehensive firm’s financial picture while minimizing default risks. Due to this, SMEs typically get lower interest rates while investors get predictable returns with extremely attractive risk/return ratio.

The key to AREX’s success lies in our commitment to building a long rewarding relationship with our partners and SMEs. We listen diligently to understand what our customers need and to service them accordingly. To achieve our Northern Star vision, AREX builds an international team of devoted co-founders and employees, who are everyday committed to empowering SMEs worldwide.

Hello Pomelo accompagne les entreprises dans la création et la mise en place d'outils digitaux.

Spécialisés dans le développement d'applications web et mobile sur-mesure, nous développons des outils de productivité, des applications métiers, des outils de communication, des logiciels d'analyse de data, etc.

Notre objectif : transformer avec nos clients une idée innovante en une activité économique rentable pour revaloriser le potentiel et le savoir-faire des collaborateurs.

Notre méthodologie : trois étapes (maquette, développement, maintenance) pour un accompagnement complet de nos clients.

1️⃣ MAQUETTE. Elément central du processus. Clé de voûte dans l'élaboration de l'outil elle permet une prise en compte optimale du besoin du client tout en évitant les écueils des cahiers des charges traditionnels.

2️⃣ DEVELOPPEMENT. Chaque solution est créée par une équipe de 3 ou 4 développeurs minimum pour permettre la solidité du code et l’efficacité de la production.

3️⃣ MAINTENANCE. Nous proposons un accompagnement sur le long terme via une offre de maintenance corrective et évolutive.

Aujourd'hui, ce sont des grands groupes comme BNP Paribas, Chaumet, Comdata, SPVIE, Crit, Hippopotamus, Groupe Bertrand, Groupe Fruidor, EY, 2Ride Group, etc, mais également des PME/ETI comme Predictis, Alliance Logistics, Air&Cosmos et bien d'autres qui nous font confiance pour leurs outils numériques.

👉 Quelques cas client : https://www.hello-pomelo.com/cas-clients

Alors vous aussi, comme eux, faites-nous confiance !

resumen: Qualifyze was originally founded under the name ChemSquare during the doctorate at the Technical University Darmstadt in September 2017. The company employs over 100+ employees across offices in Frankfurt and Barcelona, and continues to grow rapidly. Today Qualifyze works on a global, digital network in which customers, suppliers, auditors, subcontractors, and authorities continuously and securely exchange quality data in order to make supply chains more transparent and secure. A global pool of independent and accredited auditors publish their results on the Qualifyze platform, giving companies access to relevant information and quality data from their suppliers without having to carry out extensive audits themselves. Due to the higher reuse of quality data, the total number of supplier audits is reduced, which results in a significant cost reduction for all interest groups in the industry and at the same time increases transparency and security along the value chain.

SalesScreen is a global sales platform that combines gamification with data visualization to keep modern sales teams motivated and engaged. Our platform integrates with existing CRM and makes work more collaborative through a range of peer-to-peer recognition and competitions. This in-team incentivization helps our clients drive stronger revenue and better delivery of KPIs. 

The success of every company is a result of their combined talent. Even the leading products and services fall short if the people behind can’t perform at their very best. That is why we created SalesScreen. A tool that makes every employee utilize their talent and perform at the top of their potential.

We make the process of selling into a team effort, combining individual motivational instruments with cultural aspects and a winning mentality. In short, we have transformed the challenging work of sales into a professional, motivating and exciting game. A game where all your employees will have fun whilst competing amongst each other for the top-position!

Launched in Norway in 2014, SalesScreen is now used by thousands of teams all around the world. Our mission is to help build great sales organizations by making sales fun, engaging, exciting and rewarding. We are brave, talent driven, dedicated and playful. Our ambition is to become the #1 software for any sales team worldwide!

resumen:
Unforgettable experiences at every step.

The most complete ticketing and event technology platform for live events. Dedicated to delivering unforgettable experiences for fans and promoters alike.

About Us:

At Event Genius, we’re dedicated to developing the very best technology in order to deliver unforgettable experiences for event-goers around the world. Our end-to-end technology includes ticketing, access control, travel and packages, marketing, data and insights and cashless payment services.
In 2019, Event Genius (and the associated Ticket Arena consumer website and brand) was acquired by Festicket, the world’s largest platform for discovering and booking festival trips.

Through combining the two companies’ technology offerings, we are now a truly unique end-to-end platform for organisers and fans alike, providing the most complete offering in the live entertainment industry. Through the egTicketing, egCheckout, egMarketing, egTravel, egAccess and egPay solutions, our platform plugs a gap in the market that no other organisation has addressed to date.
We’re proud to have developed partnerships with over 4000 official festival and event partners including Coachella, Tomorrowland, BST Hyde Park, Ibiza Rocks, Untitled Group, Afro Nation, Motion Bristol, Amnesia Ibiza, serving a growing community of over 5 million customers.

Alongside our London HQ, you’ll also found our team all round the world, in Leeds, Los Angeles, Amsterdam, Berlin, Porto, Melbourne and Nantes.
